subroutine getFail(b, m, f)

integer, intent(in) :: m

character(len=*), intent(in) :: b

integer, dimension(0:400), intent(out) :: f

integer :: i, j

f(0) = 0

f(1) = 0

j = 0

do i = 2, m

    j = f(j) while (j >0 .and. b(j+1:j+1) /= b(i:i)) if (b(j+1:j+1) == b(i:i)) then

        j = j +1

    end if

    f(i) = j

end do

end subroutine getFail
